input.sentences: i went to a craft show this weekend .
there was a bunch of different pottery .
i even saw some fabric works .
my favorite section included some old photos .
here is the program we got for going !
output.sentences: This weekend I went to the Mexican craft fair.
There was a bunch of pottery.
I found some beautiful hand made woven fabrics.
There was a whole section included, dedicated to old photos of ancestors.
The fair was so good that it was filmed for a program on t.v. called: "The Crafts of Mexico".
